website_summaries.verdict: Little kids love the action and anticipation of the game, but older kids may not be as impressed.
pros: A cute game with a unique concept – players have to return "home" when they get wet when the dog shakes
Ideal for young kids – keeps them eagerly awaiting the dog's next move
cons: May not be challenging or interesting for older kids
Not much water comes off the dog when he shakes, but this may be a plus for parents hoping to keep messes to a minimum

customer_reviews.title: just not the fun kind of mess
customer_reviews.text: Really not impressed. The dog shakes, but not enough to actually be felt by the players. You're probably thinking, "Great, at least it won't make a mess." Wrong again, it makes a mess, just not the fun kind of mess. It's just not what I think kids will expect it to be.
customer_reviews.author: tulip17

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most misleading children’s game ever. The advertising for this game is awesome; unfortunately the game is poorly designed with very cheap materials. It doesn’t work very well and my children were really disappointed based on what they saw on tv. Bravo to the marketing team, they did an awesome job disappointing children and scamming parents. The soggy dog shakes but water drops off it’s back/sides. The water doesn’t shake anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising!
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money! The game is slow and boring and when the dog shakes no water comes off of it. My kids lost interest after 5 minutes. False advertising!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 4 year old granddaughter. When she saw the commercial again she tells me that the dog fell apart and mommy lost the game. I asked my daughter about it. She said she had to throw it away. The ears and tail fell off. The plastic was stinky and growing mold. She even tried spraying it with disinfectant & letting it dry in the sun. She said it was just gross. I was pretty disappointed since the kids were so excited to get it. I guess it was a poor design. Another item that looks cute but isn’t worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Fun family game for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: Very cute game, and easy to play. The whole family enjoys it. My only complaint: my kids are always anxious to get sprayed, and it really barely puts off any water. They just lean into it when it's their turn adn I will give the shower and extra pump or 2 so they can get a sprinkle or 2. I also love that they can play by themselves (they are 5 and 7). We play it on a towel to protect the table, but that really isn't necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Tara  Lebow Merrell

customer_reviews.title: Fun. I’m definitely happy I got this and happy our son wanted this!!!
customer_reviews.text: What I love te most- is the pure happines, the biggest and brightest smile that’s ear to ear, and the heart warming laughter from my son when we play SOGGY DOGGY!!! This game is fun,almost everytime we’ve played,his big brother and dad play with us to!!! That’s how fun and entertaining it is to play this great and fun game!! It helps with counting,colors, hand eye coordination,patience,taking turns and it brings us together as a family. I highly recommend this game. The anticipation and nervous giggling 🤭 our son gets, while turning the paw for Soggy-Doggy to.....SHAKE SHAKE SHAKE!!!
customer_reviews.author: ✨💜Adrianna (Audie) 💜✨

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this game. It doesn't really splash outward at all. Just makes a giant mess honestly. It also STINKS and is impossible to dry out. My kids were so excited to try it and they never used it again after the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Gisack

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The dog didn’t shake like it did on the YouTube reviews my son watched- also, the ear came off as we were getting it out of the package of
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Brand new game did not work!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was excited to play this game tonight and was disappointed because it doesn't work at all! The was our first time opening this game, we put in new batteries but the dog never shook any water off, the game leaked water all over our dining room table. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old wanted this for Christmas. I got it on sale for $5 and that's all it's worth. Really could be a $2-$3 toy. The water doesn't get the dog wet enough for it to shake water off. When you pump the water on the dog the water runs out of the tub and onto the table. My little one had fun with it on Christmas day but hasn't played with it much since. This game is ok for little kids I would say 4 and under. If you get this toy just beware that what ever surface you put it on will get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it less stars I would.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it less stars I would. This game is awful. Doesn’t work at all like the commercial shows...of course, but I thought it would at least work a little bit. My daughter was so excited about this game. It doesn’t shake enough at all for water to go anywhere. He just moves slightly. Super lame. I’m returning. Better get my money back without returning the box too, we tossed it thinking we’d love the game. Hate it! *This review does not have anything to do with the amazon seller selling this game, I’m sure your great! Just don’t sell this garbage game anymore. It’s a pile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible game,  waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This game is terrible and it's so disappointing. The advertisement and hype around this game was so good but the actual game is horrible!! The dog is constantly falling off the base and doesn't work right. What a waste of money. Dont buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Just a Pain
customer_reviews.text: Soggy Doggy was a must have for my kids this past Christmas. They're 3.5 and 5.5 years old. They don't request to play this game much and were rather disappointed. The dog hardly shakes. Of course in the advertising they make it look like he'll shake and get you wet. He hardly moves. The water in the tub causes a big mess so don't fill it up all the way. You have to make sure that you clean out all the pieces every time you play to avoid mold/mildew. The game usually goes pretty quick - like 5 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: DakOdinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Kids like.  Not the best bang for a buck
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but so much smaller than on tv. The dog fits into your palm and very little water comes off it.
customer_reviews.author: WGV

customer_reviews.title: Interesting toy
customer_reviews.text: This was the favorite game this Christmas. Its fairly simple to put together and requires 2 AA batteries which shake the dog. Getting water to pump from the shower head could probably be done better as not much comes out and you have to pump with some vigor to get it flowing (may be a problem for small children). The shower attachment does not mount securely into the tub, a snap on piece would have been better. The actual game play is simple, and eventually the dog shakes and splashes water around a bit. Just make sure its cleaned before putting it away as you don't want to grow mold on damp material.
customer_reviews.author: KellyR

customer_reviews.title: We must have got a broken game-dog shakes on every turn
customer_reviews.text: This was our greatest Christmas disappointment. My son had wanted this for months. It was the first gift I bought because he'd seen it advertised and was so excited to try it. He talked about it every day. Every time we turn the dog bone handle, soggy doggy shakes uncontrollably. It's super loud and it takes FIVE turns to get it to stop. It completely ruined the flow of the game obviously because there is a never a turn where it DOESN'T shake.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Peace

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The commercials for this game (and the reason my six-year-old son was desperate to get it) show the dog being soggy and wet and water flying when the dog shakes. In reality, the dog and his fur are made of a rubbery material that doesn't really hold on to the water, and when he shakes it's not vigorously enough to fling water anywhere. Young kids can benefit from the simplicity of the rules, but overall, the action is pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Girl

customer_reviews.title: Buy Operation or Candy Land instead
customer_reviews.text: this game is lame. The dog barely shakes, it doesn't get anything wet when it shakes, the game board goes in a circle around the tub so you can't see half the game board. Simple, boring game that take a lot of set up and clean up because everything has to dry, and the water has to be dumped out. I've played this game only three times with my 4 year old daughter and I'm donating it next time we purge. Don't waste your money, I wish I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: JDNH

customer_reviews.title: Let Down...
customer_reviews.text: The dog had a hole in it before we even took it out of the box. It was still usable but was not a crowd pleaser. When it shakes it is hardly any water and you have to be inches away to even feel anything. My 4 year old and 7 year old wouldn't even play a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not very Soggy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game for my great nephews who are 5 and 6 yrs old. We played it Christmas Day and while the anticipation of the clicks were pretty fun, the actual shaking of the dog was a bit of a let down. I didn't expect to get soaked, but i did expect to at least see the water coming off. Cute concept, could use some tweaking on the placement of the shower head to get more water on the back of the dog. Kids liked it and it wasn't very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game where younger kids can be included (under 5). Played with one younger and one older kid and first game where we all played and everyone had fun as the younger kids get the rules and there’s no big strategy to make it harder. But fun when you have to turn the cogs to see if the dog will shake. Doesn’t soak the table or anything either, just a few drops here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Check the package upon receiving
customer_reviews.text: I got this game for my son for Christmas. We ordered it ahead of time. I did not check the box before wrapping it. When my son opened it, the ears on the dog where ripped off! They were still in the box too. By the time he opened it, it was too late to return. I highly recommend opening it and checking it before giving as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Cute game
customer_reviews.text: This game is quite simple and easy to follow. It does take a while to get the water up through the ‘shower’ and when he shakes it doesn’t get water anywhere - good for me as a mum, disappointing for my kids who wanted to get wet. Cute game though.
customer_reviews.author: Kate E Davis

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the game, but water gets all over the table just from "showering" the dog with the water before he even shakes off. We followed the directions so there isn't too much water in there. When the dog shakes, it doesn't splash you very much. More water gets on the table than on you. The dog and system are easy to dry and store.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lacy

customer_reviews.title: My son loves the game, he was so excited ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the game, he was so excited to receive this. I, on the other hand, don't always want to get wet by the soggy dog so... it's the kind of game you have to be prepared to play. It isn't complicated at all, very simple but because of the shock of the sudden water, even "older" kids who would think its too simple still ended up loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel LV

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute
customer_reviews.text: This game is super cute and fun to play. This was a gift for my daughter and we all are enjoying playing it with her. We certainly got quite a few laughs out of it. I do recommend bottles water for it so that it doesn't get any time of build up on it and remember that you can not use soap on it. I would definitely recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Molmor

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE...may not work.
customer_reviews.text: With new batteries and my husband and I both trying to get this to work, sadly it just doesn't. The saddest part is this was a gift and it shipped to APO so we didn't know it didn't work until after the return window. So we now have to eat the cost for a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Just adorable (and not annoying if your kid plays it properly)
customer_reviews.text: Adorable game, my daughter loves it. Only thing I wish was that the shaking timed out at a certain point, although i know their are mechanical limitations. My daughter loves to just sit with the bath tub and trigger the shaking, and it’s way louder than i expected it to be. A little grating, but is the perfect kids game when played properly. Like Candy Land meets Hot Potato meets adorable puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 3 kids ages 3-7. They loved the idea of it but the game play was a little hard for them to grasp so we make up our own rules. They were expecting to get a little more soggy and felt that the shower head was to close to the doggy. Its cute though and they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Richards

customer_reviews.title: Cute game!
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is a cute concept! However, the box we received had the instructions/directions in a different language. I ended up finding a manual online, so that helped! Great family game with little kids! We played for over an hour...lots of laughs!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Very gimicky
customer_reviews.text: The doggy is very cute and my kids do love it. That said, there is no real "game" to it. There doesn't seem to be an end goal, other than to soak my towels, table, and each other. The game itself has no real direction or point and my kids lose interest quickly with it. Then they just want to soak the dog and get him to shake, while soaking him more, adding more and more water until I have a big soggy mess to clean. We have yet to figure out how to "win" the game.
customer_reviews.author: Doron T.

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kids as a Christmas gift they had been asking for it every time they saw commercial on TV. They were excited but I wasn’t to impressed. It only held their attention for a few minutes. Glad it wasn’t to expensive or I would have given it less stars
customer_reviews.author: kayla welch

customer_reviews.title: Great family night game (with smaller children)
customer_reviews.text: Soggy doggy is a great game to play with the family. Our 6 year old loves it, our 9 year old tolerates it but I'm not sure for how much longer. You will need a little room and a surface that is okay getting wet. The doggy "shakes" off so there will be some water, plan ahead for that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crimella

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal for $5.  Doesn't have to ability to shake water everywhere (But I'm glad!)
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect to get wet, but the kids had fun playing. Fairly simple. Two 5 year olds were capable of playing independently after learning rules. It'll get surface wet, so use common sense and protect underneath. With that same common sense, use treated city water or bottled water and make sure you air dry it all before storage. So far it's been durable.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Pump didn't work
customer_reviews.text: My kids really wanted this game after seeing the commercials. We are disappointed. The pump does not work, we tried messing with it for a good 30 mins to no avail. We did play 2 games without the dog actually getting a shower and the kids 2, 3, 6 and 7 enjoyed it but we were really expecting and hopping to get splashed. Even if the shower worked its just an ok game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute commerical. Lackluster game
customer_reviews.text: The commercial for this cute and seemed like a neat game. It isn't. They have a great advertising jingle but the game doesn't live up the hype or really even work well enough to be fun. I would skip this
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Oates

customer_reviews.title: Ok game, surprised it won an award
customer_reviews.text: I guess I expected more but it’s just an ok game. The water can spill, the “ fur” is starting to lose elasticity already. Not one of our favorites
customer_reviews.author: carla anderson stowe

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We love this silly, messy game so much, we've bought it as presents for others. It will wet the surface it's on, but it's a small price to pay for the fun. It's great for kids from 3 to 8, at least.
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: You dont get wet.
customer_reviews.text: We were expecting to get wet but my kids were disappointed when the shake of the dog didn't even get our hands wet. I was thankful but took the fun of the game away.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&MrsMiramontes

customer_reviews.title: More fun for the kids than adults
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this game. I don’t but it’s not for me. Once I get them set-up they don’t need me to play so that’s a bonus. It really doesn’t make that much of a mess either. I placed the dog and tub on a kitchen towel and that seems to cut down on the puddles.
customer_reviews.author: sev619

customer_reviews.title: Not as fun as it looks
customer_reviews.text: My kids played with it less than five times. The game makes a big mess. The dog doesn't shake nearly as much as the video clip shows and the game itself is kind of boring. A big let down since this was a reward my four-year-old worked toward.
customer_reviews.author: CraftyMama

customer_reviews.title: Have paper towels handy!
customer_reviews.text: The dog doesn’t shake as much as we were hoping, and the set up is a little confusing. The game really has no strategy or much learning elements involved, but my kiddos still squeal with excitement every time they get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Akicia R.

customer_reviews.title: Shake puppy shake!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. My 7 yr old likes it. Doesn't really get you wet when the dog shakes but I'm sure some parents will be happy about that lol. I place a puppy pad underneath the game though before playing because it can get messy as far as having to poor more water into the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter is excited about this one
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo loves this. I dont get it but she is very excited. You will need a screwdriver to remove the battery cover. Has tiny parts so be careful with very young kids - choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Sherese

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for my good buddy's daughter. She loves it, couldn't wait to get home to play it. Looks like it's a very fun game for kids AND adults! Amazon shipping rocks! It was delayed and said it'd be delivered the day after her birthday party, but USPS came through and was delivered same day (original day)!
customer_reviews.author: InfiniteReality

customer_reviews.title: Cute game
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a cute little game. My son loves it we play with it quiet often . Thankfully it's easy clean up and not super messy. Seriously recommend for the little ones
customer_reviews.author: SarahB

customer_reviews.title: Not a great toy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandchildren and set it up outside on the deck. They had their bathing suits on thinking they'd get a little wet. But it did not spray water as we hoped. The kids were very disappointed in this. We barely felt ANY sprinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Suszoo1

customer_reviews.title: I was so ready to love this.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and the dog didn't shake. Amazon then sent me another one - which also didn't work. We were so excited to play this. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big hit for my kids!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this game. They are 5 and 7 and play it by themselves every day since they got it. I'm not a fan of indoor toys involving water, but the amount of water this uses is minimal and it really doesn't make a huge mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: We got this on sale and it is so worth the regular price. Very cute. Our 4 year old loves it. You till make somewhat of a mess as you use actually water. Easy for little ones to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, and fun for little ones
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yo daughter absolutely loves this game. It's pretty cute. Very basic play so its food for young ones that want to play games. We even play without the water. It really doesn't make much mess. Nothing a a paper towel or two can't clean up. I like it so much I'm buy for a gift for another a little girs bday.
customer_reviews.author: Christian dannell walker

customer_reviews.title: The product is an excellent idea that is why I am giving it so ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is an excellent idea that is why I am giving it so many stars IF ONLY it worked well! The dog barely shakes which means the water will not reach the children playing the game. After playing it three times the motor went out completely.
customer_reviews.author: Ijustmight

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Kids got bored with the game. Messy to play with indoors. Wouldn't buy again. Not much play value after the first few times of playing the game.
customer_reviews.author: KAR

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it during a sale and I am glad I did. The game is very cute however it gets boring very fast! This game is better for 2-4 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Jocie

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun! It doesn't splash as much as you would think, which is okay by me! It's an enjoyable game for the whole family and the puppy is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: We could never get this game to actually work. My girls were so excited but it just doesn’t function. Even if it did the premise of the game is terrible. My kids just end up throwing water at each other which is much more fun than trying to get a rubber dog to shake.
customer_reviews.author: Anna310

customer_reviews.title: This game is very cute but such a mess to ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is very cute but such a mess to play. You need to have a covered play area because water gets everywhere. We set it up according to directions and the dog does not shake water as seen in the commercials. It just drips water all over the table and is really not a game I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: manteno203

customer_reviews.title: Was a hit with the kids
customer_reviews.text: This toy was an instant hit with my 4yr old nephew, he was so excited that he tore the box to pieces to get at that little dog. Well-made, easy to clean and dry, and utterly cute.
customer_reviews.author: ICGRRL

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute game
customer_reviews.text: Took a second to figure it out. Once we did, very simple game. Good for pretty much any age. 3 yr old daughter gets a kick out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hursey-Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great game for small kids
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious fun! My 5 yr old son looooves this game! Definitely made for younger kids but still has a fun and engaging concept. It doesn't shake the water very far which is great from mom-who-has-to-clean-up mode. Just keep a small towel handy near the game on the table. The game is good quality. Mostly sturdy plastic. The dog is a squishy rubbery texture so easy to rinse and dry. The game usually lasts about 10 minutes which is just long enough for my son to sit still!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as shown on tv.
customer_reviews.text: Kids saw this on tv and had to have it. Very disappointing. Doesn’t work at all like on tv. They put it up and never have asked to play again. Waste of money. Dog doesn’t even get water anywhere and that’s the point.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: THE KIDS LIKE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of their favorite games for about a month. They lost interest after that and now play with it occasionally. Overall, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: DebbyM

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving
customer_reviews.text: It looks like fun but we couldn’t get it to work. My son ripped the ears off pretty easily. I’d skip it and get something else!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love the game but having issues with the dog actually shaking
customer_reviews.text: Love the game but having issues with the dog actually shaking. My kids get frustrated if it doesn’t work the way it’s supposed to right away so we don’t play it as much as other games.
customer_reviews.author: Melania

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the other reviews but instead i bought it anyway and now i regret it. The dog shakes but does not shake any water off the dog so noone gets wet. Waste of time and money. Needs to be a recall on this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gaspard

customer_reviews.title: Cute concept design is eh.
customer_reviews.text: I have a toddler and knew he would love this. But no matter how hard I’ve tried we can not get the shower to work right. I feel like the concept of the game was a good idea but there are some design flaws. The dogs ears also come off mighty easily. I love the idea but wish it was made better.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey F

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this product is made well and the kids love playing it. I wanted the water to splash a little more, but I think the more you play the more it will splash. The kids in my class love this game and ask to play all the time. I wish the game board was a little different bc it makes it a little hard to the kids to play in a larger group.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fun for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Cute game for kids. My four year old son loves playing this game. It doesn’t really spray that much water which is fine for me. My son even just plays with it as a toy. He loves his soggy doggy
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Cute game. My 7 and 9 year old like it. We have had it a couple years now and it's one of our family favorites
customer_reviews.author: Faith M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My brother liked the game he said if was fun. It was easy enough for a 5 year old to understand and it didn't smell like mildew after having it for 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Not much fun and very messy in an annoying way.
customer_reviews.text: The kids thought it is not much fun. It does not splash much when it shakes but you bump it and half the tub spills on the table. It's kind of annoying and frustrating for kids.
customer_reviews.author: amreason

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: Almost need an adult around due to water spillage. Definitely a plastic underneath. Fun, brought laughs, but kids tired of it quickly and took the doggy off the frame to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Soggy Doggy Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters, 8 and 12 just love this game. Fun and the doggy is very cute. Doesn't shake off a lot of water so not messy. Easy and fun game for all at Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: L. McManus

customer_reviews.title: Ok Game
customer_reviews.text: It's sort of fun; it's very simple. My 4 year old finds it funny when the dog shakes, but it doesn't shake hard enough to get anyone wet. She was a bit disappointed in that. It's a very small game; I don't think it will hold her attention for long.
customer_reviews.author: jovigirl214

customer_reviews.title: Don't have HIGH hopes.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this game BUT my daughter was very disappointed with the actual size and shape of the game pieces The game pieces are tiny. Probably would not buy Again.
customer_reviews.author: 6MBones

customer_reviews.title: Major disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas gift for my daughter because she really wanted it. After one use, it is clearly a waste of money. She was truly disappointed with it. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lendt

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: This is all my kid asked for at Christmas, and she loves it! It’s a fun game and we all crack up playing with her! It’s a little messy, but great to play out on the porch!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: fun messy game
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a fun game and is a christmas gift to 2 little girls grandchildren that is sure to wet everything and make the 2n young parents so happy
customer_reviews.author: CDG Technical Writer

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter and her whole family are big on games and they love this game. I haven’t had a chance to play yet. I’m glad I got it for them.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Little pieces Messy but Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Fun game for the family. Adorable theme. Gets very messy so place on mat on table. Son liked it once then didn’t have any interest. He does however sometimes look to play with the dog
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cheap looking and it doesn’t splash too much. Nieces and nephew (4-9 years old) think it's a great game though
customer_reviews.author: KendallG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: A little messy but the kids like it. I don't really understand it but the kids don't seem to mind and they enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: Put a plastic sheet down! Be sure they are wearing clothes you do not mind getting wet. They soon learn how to make him shake when they want. They love this game!
customer_reviews.author: LSmith

customer_reviews.title: Soggy Doggy game
customer_reviews.text: My oldest grand daughter saw this game on tv a few weeks before Christmas and said she wanted it. When she opened her gifts, she screamed with excitement over this. I hope she brings it over to my house the next time she visits so I can play it with her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: The game was boring for my nieces and nephews because it took so long to get the dog to shake off and when he finally did there was hardly any water. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Water doesn't really "shake" off dog.
customer_reviews.text: The description and the picture of this game make it look fun and as of water will fly of the dog. The shower thing barely gets the dog wet, and it definitely doesn't shake water off in a way to make it "wet" fun.
customer_reviews.author: Poddedpeas

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After installing new batteries, doggy shakes, but does not shake very much water. The bathtub is full and doggy is soaked. Children are very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun for my children to play! I was nervous you'd get really wet but you actually do not get wet at all.
customer_reviews.author: rahart1362

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Very cute game. My 5 year old nephew loves it. Got it on sale great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Freely

customer_reviews.title: Didnt suit my purpose
customer_reviews.text: Not suited for young kids. ( 4 and 6) .too many parts..they get bored and just play with the doggie part.. ( squishy)
customer_reviews.author: tizzy

customer_reviews.title: Connection from shower pipe to bath tub leaks ,
customer_reviews.text: This product is cute but the showerhead to the Bath tub leaks so the water pressure never reach the showerhead for the dog to get wet product need some adjustments
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute game
customer_reviews.text: Decent game, a little clumsy set up but my 2 and 4 year olds were happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amie R

customer_reviews.title: Game made for really young children
customer_reviews.text: My kids only played it a few times but I think it was just too easy for them. They lost interest quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas for my 3 year old niece who's getting into games. This seems like a perfect toddler aged game! Very cute and great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Candace P.

customer_reviews.title: Served Its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Idk how well it works. Bought it as a secret Santa gift for a family my church supported over the holidays. I can only hope the little girl liked it even though it doesn’t have very good reviews lol.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Barry

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: for adults too! I don't mind playing for hours with my son, and he will absolutely play for hours
customer_reviews.author: JulieM

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept and fun to play. The parts aren't that durable though.
customer_reviews.author: gleasongirl

customer_reviews.title: Too many parts that don't stay together. Make it easier for a kid
customer_reviews.text: I think it had too many parts. The game could be made better and all one piece. He like the dog mostly more then the game it self
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute game that my 3 year old lobes. One ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute game that my 3 year old lobes. One star off because it didn't shake enough to spray water....but still very cute!
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas, when she opened it it was broken. Cute idea but not well made
customer_reviews.author: J.P. Ricci

product_meta.title: Soggy Doggy Board Game for kids ages 4-8
product_meta.description: Who will get soaked first? Find out when you play Soggy Doggy, the showering, shaking, wet doggy game! Move your players around the board and take turns bathing this pup. But be careful! He loves to shake himself dry. If Soggy Doggy shakes all over you, wipe yourself off and head back to the start. The first one around the board wins! This anticipation-filled game of splishy splashy fun is great for kids and adults alike. So gather the family and get ready for a hilarious and exciting time with Soggy Doggy!
feature_bullets: Soggy Doggy is the action-packed, suspense-filled board game of bath time fun!
Race around the board and take turns giving Soggy Doggy a bath. But watch out! He loves to shake himself dry!
Get soaked and you’re sent back to start. Make it around the bathtub and you win!
Board game for kids aged 4+. 2-4 players. Requires 3 x AA batteries (not included).
Included: Soggy Doggy, Dog Frame, Bathtub, Game Board, 4 Game Pieces, 4 Tokens, 1 Die, Instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,752 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
